name: 0.5 - Hips (no shame)
description:
809px x 609px
Stop-motion animated GIF - montage
Performer’s moving hips.

The fifth of ten pieces that make "Series 0: Performer’s body static archive". This series tries to show in each separate piece, the performer's body. The work does not pretend to be an objective approach of the body but rather to operate like an impression.


Additional .pdf content with your purchase.
